Name: Overview
School Scores: SAT scores for students across the United States, organized by year and state.

Name: Description
School Scores: SAT Scores from across the country

Name: Tags
School Scores: school, education, K-12, kindergarten, learning, teaching, sat

Name: Properties
column5: Description
The year of this report.

The average GPA of all students in this state during this year in Arts/Music. Note that this is just the GPA within the subject, not across all academic subjects.
The average number of years that a student has studied Arts/Music when they took the exam.
